attributes.action: Ban the use of Police Horses as crowd control
attributes.background: The use of police horses is dangerous and cruel, especially in crowds where there is constant noise and lot going on. its an outdated idea when we have cars and motorbikes instead.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ban the use of horses in the police force: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325179

Ban the use of horses for crowd control: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325275
